text: Lye Siew Weng () was a Malaysian politician. He was a member of the Penang State Legislative Assembly, representing Air Itam between 1995 and 2004, then Air Putih as well as Deputy Speaker from 2004 to 2008. Before politics he was teacher, primary school headmaster and social workerhttps://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2018/02/28/three-term-penang- assemblyman-lye-siew-weng-passes-away/#5l1wThe9dc1wqroR.99 He died of bone cancer on 28 February 2018, aged 77. ==References== Category:1940s births Category:2018 deaths Category:Members of the Penang State Legislative Assembly Category:Deaths from cancer in Malaysia Category:Deaths from bone cancer Category:Malaysian Chinese Association politicians
title: Lye Siew Weng
